laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated serum interleukin-2 receptor to 659 U/mL (normal: 124–466)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normalization of serum interleukin-2 receptor observed during follow-up

laboratory_examinations.findings: Maximum standardized uptake value (SUVmax) ranging from 1.4 to 2.7, multifocal abnormal FDG uptake in the right thorax
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Gradual and spontaneous regression of lung lesions observed in follow-up CT images
